comment: Give the title of a fav book and tag the first person that pops up with that letter ! Follow ! Make friends ! M O B Y D I C K
amr:
# ::snt Give the title of a fav book and tag the first person that pops up with that letter ! Follow ! Make friends ! M O B Y D I C K
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (g / give-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG2-of (t2 / title-01
                              :ARG1 (b / book
                                    :ARG1-of (f / favor-01)))))
            :op2 (t3 / tag-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                              :value 1)
                        :ARG1-of (p2 / pop-up-03
                              :instrument (l / letter
                                    :mod (t4 / that))))))
      :snt2 (f2 / follow-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y2 / you))
      :snt3 (m2 / make-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y2
            :ARG1 (f3 / friend))
      :snt4 (a2 / amr-unintelligible
            :value "M O-b-Y D I C K"))
